hobbies.title: Photography
hobbies.description: Love to take photos and use a camera for it's purpose. Some how I have ended up with 5 cameras, a variety from new to old. Some of my better pictures are displayed within the portfolio section.

hobbies.title: Sim Racing
hobbies.description: Ever since I was little I have always been into cars. I have tried out a few racing sims however most of my time is spent on the dinky one I have at home. The one in the image is probably a bit too overkill.... and would require a whole room to house. It was fun to use though!

hobbies.title: Reading
hobbies.description: I like to think outside the box and learn as much as I can. Unfortunately I also get distracted and never really finish my books.

hobbies.title: Coding
hobbies.description: Being able to put together things that help me solve an issue or help me display who I am is what I enjoy.

hobbies.title: Flying planes
hobbies.description: Although technically I have not done anywhere close to the flight hours required at this moment, I really enjoyed the experience of flying a plane and would like to start working towards my RPL soon!

hobbies.title: Leather work
hobbies.description: Technically I have not created anything with real leather - as I do not think that I have the skills to do that yet - I love working with my hands to create things that I can use in daily life.

hobbies.title: 3D Printing
hobbies.description: The machine that can make objects appear out of no where. 3D printing has lead to some really cool opportunities like buidling a keyboard from scratch or developing an organizational system.

hobbies.title: Driving - But in real life
hobbies.description: I love driving around and exploring new places! Statistically my heart rate is second lowest while I am driving followed by sleeping.

hobbies.title: Watches
hobbies.description: Recently I have been getting into collecting time pieces, learning the difference between monetary value and sentimental value has been a big thing.

hobbies.title: Traveling
hobbies.description: Not sure if this counts as a hobby but I love being able to hop onto a plane and explore a new place.

hobbies.title: Food
hobbies.description: Maybe I this is a hobby, maybe I just like to eat. Who knows.

hobbies.title: Drone Flying
hobbies.description: Like to fly the drone to get pictures and explore the skies.
